body:
Comment 8: 
On Linux:

$ du -h
38M bin
52M pkg/linux_amd64
57M pkg/linux_amd64_race

On Darwin:
$ du -h
 46M	../bin
 52M	../pkg//darwin_amd64
 57M	../pkg//darwin_amd64_race

tar.gz with normal packages is 11.22MB
tar.gz with race packages is 12.33MB

Whole darwin/amd64 distribution is 26.4MB, so race will add ~1/2.
